Job Description

An internationally recognized appliances manufacturing company is seeking an Operations Coordinator / Inside Sales Representative to work at their office in Torrance, CA.

  • Entry level candidates are welcome
  • Temp to Hire
  • $20 - 22 / hour; Non-Exempt
  • Hybrid work schedule (3 days office, 2 days remote) after completion of training

Requirements Of The Operations Coordinator / Inside Sales Representative:
  • Associate degree or working towards degree, Bachelor’s degree is preferred
  • Bilingual in English and Japanese / Korean / Chinese / OR Vietnamese is big plus
  • Exceptional communication and customer service skills
  • Proficient in MS Office (Especially strong Excel Skill is needed)
  • Good phone manners and problem solver
  • Detail-oriented, organized, and strong with numbers

Responsibilities Of The Operations Coordinator / Inside Sales Representative:
  • Work closely with Sales Reps
  • Process Orders
  • Create and process necessary documentation and generate invoices
  • Communicate with clients and provide customer service
  • Generate various reports using Excel
  • Receives customers’ inquiries by telephone and Email, provides information requested
  • Educate customers about terminology, features and benefits of products
  • Occasionally visit client’s site and attend tradeshows as needed
  • Communicate with HQ in Japan as needed
  • Other related duties and administrative duties

Employment Type: Temp to Hire

Location: Torrance, CA

Schedule: Monday to Friday: 8:30AM – 5:30PM

Customer Service , CS , Inside Sales , Customer Support , Customer Care , Order Process , Excel , Communication Skill , Trouble Shooting , Problem Solving , entry , Entry level , Entry-level , college graduate , Student Work

Company Description

For over twenty years, TriCom Quest has been a leader in the employment consultant industry, providing staffing services for both employers and job seekers, at virtually every level - from entry to executive. Our service spans the United States, providing placements for a broad range of companies, including those headquartered in the Pacific Rim with satellite offices within the United States. Yet what makes us stand out from the employment "crowd" is our service. Whether you're hiring employees or in search of a job, TriCom Quest is committed to quality service, from the very first handshake to placement, and beyond.
